game.name: Back to the Future: Ep 1 - It's About Time
Wallace & Gromit Ep 2: The Last Resort

achievement.name: Daredevil

achievement.name: Smithy

achievement.description: Reached Survival Wave 20 on Medium Difficulty

achievement.name: Iron Man
achievement.description: Reached Survival Wave 10 on Insane Difficulty

achievement.name: Defense Is the Best Offense
achievement.description: Reached Wave 10 on all levels in Pure Strategy on at least Medium Difficulty

achievement.name: True Nobility
achievement.description: Earned the Lord Award on at least Medium Difficulty

achievement.name: O Mighty Smiter!
achievement.description: Wore a full set of Godly Items

achievement.name: Divine Intention
achievement.description: Picked up a Godly Weapon

achievement.name: Perfectionist
achievement.description: Earned the Flawless Victory Award on all Missions on at least Medium Difficulty

achievement.name: Mastermind
achievement.description: Earned the Master Strategist Award on all Missions

achievement.name: Brute Force
achievement.description: Earned the Gunslinger Award on all Missions

achievement.name: Team Effort
achievement.description: Completed all levels with 4 active players on at least Medium Difficulty

achievement.name: A Matter of Perspective
achievement.description: Saw all four Hero endings

achievement.name: Group Hug
achievement.description: Raised a Hero of each type to Level 70

achievement.name: Catch 'em All
achievement.description: Stored all Pet types in your Item Box or on your Heroes

achievement.name: Master Banker
achievement.description: Stored 15,000,000 Mana in your Mana Bank

achievement.name: Good Student
achievement.description: Completed the Tutorial. You deserve a cookie!

achievement.name: Legendary Defender
achievement.description: You have earned every Dungeon Defenders Accomplishment! Trendy salutes you!

achievement.name: Jingled All the Way
achievement.description: Delivered all the presents, and saved Santa Tavernkeep from the vile clutches of Mega-Snowman in the 'Etherian Holiday Extravaganza Challenge Mission'!

achievement.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Purple
achievement.description: You retrieved the Purple Lost Eternia Shard from the depths of Mistymire Forest!

achievement.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Purple
achievement.description: You retrieved the Purple Lost Eternia Shard from the depths of Mistymire Forest... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Portal Protector
achievement.description: You defended the portal against the rampaging Spider horde!

achievement.name: Nightmare Portal Protector
achievement.description: You defended the portal against the rampaging Spider horde... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Mythical Defender
achievement.description: You completed every mission in the original Campaign on Nightmare difficulty! Are you a god?

achievement.name: Hardcore Mythical Defender
achievement.description: You completed every mission in the original campaign on Nightmare difficulty without dying. You are a god.

achievement.name: Dungeon Raider
achievement.description: You completed every mission in the Assault Mission Pack!

achievement.name: Mythical Dungeon Raider
achievement.description: You completed every mission in the Assault Mission Pack on Nightmare Difficulty!

achievement.name: Playin' Cupid
achievement.description: You played matchmaker for the gender mobs on the Sky O' Love challenge, and defeated Mega Cupid!

achievement.name: Playin' Mythical Cupid
achievement.description: You played matchmaker for the gender mobs on the Sky O' Love challenge, and defeated Mega Cupid... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Transcendent Challenge Champion
achievement.description: You completed every original Challenge on Nightmare Hardcore difficulty. The gods weep before your awesome might!

achievement.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Blue
achievement.description: You retrieved the Blue Lost Eternia Shard from the scorching sands of Moraggo!

achievement.name: Djinn Recruiter
achievement.description: You assembled an army to win the 'War of the Djinn' Challenge!

achievement.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Blue
achievement.description: You retrieved the Blue Lost Eternia Shard from the scorching sands of Moraggo... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Nightmare Djinn Recruiter
achievement.description: You assembled an army to win the 'War of the Djinn' Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Transcendent Survivalist
achievement.description: You achieved Nightmare Survival Victory on every Campaign mission, and are thus rewarded!

achievement.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Yellow
achievement.description: You retrieved the Yellow Lost Eternia Shard from the cold waters of Aquanos!

achievement.name: Puzzle Solver
achievement.description: You solved the 'Riddle of the Deep' Challenge!

achievement.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Yellow
achievement.description: You retrieved the Yellow Lost Eternia Shard from the cold waters of Aquanos... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Nightmare Puzzle Solver
achievement.description: You solved the 'Riddle of the Deep' Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Real Time Strategist
achievement.description: Completed the Campaign and 3 Eternia Shards Missions using only summoned minions and Overlord mode for your entire team, except for the Final Wave.

achievement.name: Mythical Real Time Strategist
achievement.description: Completed the Campaign and 3 Eternia Shards Missions only using summoned minions and Overlord mode for your entire team, except for the Final Wave... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Eternia Shard Recovered: Red
achievement.description: You retrieved the Red Lost Eternia Shard from the billowing clouds of Sky City!

achievement.name: Nightmare Eternia Shard Recovered: Red
achievement.description: You retrieved the Red Lost Eternia Shard from the billowing clouds of Sky City... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Boss Crusher
achievement.description: You completed the Boss Rush Challenge!

achievement.name: Nightmare Boss Crusher
achievement.description: You completed the Boss Rush Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Heroes to the Rescue
achievement.description: You journeyed to the Crystalline Dimension, rescued the Legendary Heroes, and defeated an ultimate evil!

achievement.name: Nightmare Heroes to the Rescue
achievement.description: You journeyed to the Crystalline Dimension, rescued the Legendary Heroes, and defeated an ultimate evil... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: I've Got Monsters in My Pocket
achievement.description: You collected every Pet in all Etheria in your Item Box!

achievement.name: Ultimate Defender
achievement.description: You earned every Dungeon Defenders Accomplishment through the Eternia Shards Campaign! Trendy bows before your might!

achievement.name: Anniversary Defender
achievement.description: You defended your Tavern against the horde!

achievement.name: Nightmare Anniversary Defender
achievement.description: You defended your Tavern against the horde... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Pumpkin Party
achievement.description: You completed the Halloween Spooktacular 2 Challenge!

achievement.name: Pumpkin Party Nightmare
achievement.description: You completed the Halloween Spooktacular 2 Challenge... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Greater Turkey Hunter
achievement.description: You purged the ruins of Karathiki of all Turkey interlopers!

achievement.name: Nightmare Greater Turkey Hunter
achievement.description: You purged the ruins of Karathiki of all Turkey interlopers... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Not So Silent Night
achievement.description: You delivered Santa's goodies... and then took on the big man himself!

achievement.name: Nightmare Not So Silent Night
achievement.description: You delivered Santa's goodies... and then took on the big man himself... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Winter Wonderland
achievement.description: You survived the onslaught of the Holiday Guardians!

achievement.name: Nightmare Winter Wonderland
achievement.description: You survived the onslaught of the Holiday Guardians... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Playin' Anticupid
achievement.description: You successfully prevented hordes of mob matches in the Temple O' Love!

achievement.name: Nightmare Playin' Anticupid
achievement.description: You successfully prevented hordes of mob matches in the Temple O' Love... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: Tinkerer's Defender
achievement.description: You Defended the Tinker's Lab and cleared the way for EV's upgrade!

achievement.name: Nightmare Tinkerer's Defender
achievement.description: You Defended the Tinkerer's Lab and cleared the way for EV's upgrade... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: EV Reprogrammer
achievement.description: You assaulted the Lab and eliminated the squad of corrupted EV's!

achievement.name: Nightmare EV Reprogrammer
achievement.description: You assaulted the Lab and eliminated the squad of corrupted EV's... on Nightmare!

achievement.name: The Entity
achievement.description: What is the entity?

achievement.name: Elite
achievement.description: Make a 6 star system.

achievement.name: Supremacy
achievement.description: As a star have an orbiting life planet with 100 kills.

achievement.name: Asteroid Nursery
achievement.description: Have 15 asteroid moons around your planet.

achievement.name: Overcrowding
achievement.description: Get the maximum possible life in your system.

achievement.name: Super Clock
achievement.description: Get 10 planets in your system orbiting clockwise.

achievement.name: Betrayal
achievement.description: Grow to a black hole from a multi star system.

achievement.name: Flying Blind
achievement.description: Go from a small black hole (<150k mass) to Big Crunch without the interface visible.

achievement.name: Speed Cycle
achievement.description: Go from Big Bang to Big Crunch in under 20 minutes. No menu respawning.

achievement.name: Gentle But Firm
achievement.description: Complete the 2nd part of the "Fine Art" mission without dying and without evolved life on your planet.

achievement.name: Ninja
achievement.description: Complete each of the "Assassin" mission parts without dying.

achievement.name: I Got This
achievement.description: Kill all the attacking ships in the first part of the "Heist" mission before completing it.

achievement.name: Hobo Star
achievement.description: Start the 3rd part of the "Duel" mission as a single star with no planets and beat it in under 3 minutes.

achievement.name: I'm Late!
achievement.description: Complete the first part of the "Concert" mission in under 1 minute.

achievement.name: Planetary Soloist
achievement.description: Complete the second part of the "Concert" mission with no evolved life on your planet.

achievement.name: Why did you kill me?
achievement.description: Why?

achievement.name: Get Lost
achievement.description: Get Lost.

achievement.name: Grind Star
achievement.description: Make a 40 star system.

achievement.name: Dude, I Don't Suck!
achievement.description: Beat all the missions without using Physics or God options.

achievement.name: Dark Champion
achievement.description: Beat the final boss as a dark matter star without using Physics or God options.

achievement.name: Master Thief
achievement.description: Steal 10 planets on the "Planet Stealer" challenge mission.

achievement.name: Challenge Novice
achievement.description: Complete every challenge mission with any score.

achievement.name: Challenge Pro
achievement.description: Complete every challenge mission with a hard level score.

achievement.name: Snowflake Star
achievement.description: Get 4 points in the star challenge mission "Snowball Fight".

achievement.name: Plot Matters
achievement.description: Beat story mode with all characters.

achievement.name: You Only Live Once
achievement.description: Win a ranked match using the YOLO Gem.

achievement.name: A Real Headache
achievement.description: Win a ranked match by getting TOTAL DOMINATION.

achievement.name: Found a Fraud
achievement.description: Fraud detect an opponent in a ranked match.

achievement.name: Choked Out
achievement.description: Choke detect an opponent in a ranked match.

achievement.name: Body Builder
achievement.description: Play 1000 matches in VS mode.

achievement.name: Real Divekicker
achievement.description: Play 500 ranked matches.

achievement.name: Dat Triple
achievement.description: Get a triple S ranking in a ranked match.

achievement.name: No Skills Needed
achievement.description: Win a ranked match without using any special moves.

achievement.name: Not a Factor
achievement.description: Win a ranked match without activating Kickfactor.

achievement.name: Perfection
achievement.description: Beat story mode using the YOLO gem.

achievement.name: Reversal of Fortune
achievement.description: Knock out an opponent who is in Kickfactor while you are concussed in a ranked match.

achievement.name: I Have My Reasons
achievement.description: Beat story mode with one character.

achievement.name: Grinder Supreme
achievement.description: Play 2000 ranked matches.

achievement.name: Defeat Fanzara
achievement.description: Defeat Fanzara in a fight.

achievement.name: Defeat Elder
achievement.description: Defeat Elder in a fight.

achievement.name: Defeat Lilith
achievement.description: Defeat Lilith in a fight.

achievement.name: Defeat Vorgga
achievement.description: Defeat Vorgga in a fight.

achievement.name: Defeat Wordrak
achievement.description: Defeat Wordrak in a fight.

achievement.description: Kill Fanzara.

achievement.description: Kill Lilith

achievement.description: Kill Vorgga.

achievement.name: Wordrak is dead.
achievement.description: Kill Wordrak

achievement.name: Lightweight Killer
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Featherweight difficulty.

achievement.name: Learning the Ropes
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Apprentice difficulty.

achievement.name: A Real Accomplishment
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Adept difficulty.

achievement.name: That Takes Some Skill
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Skilled difficulty.

achievement.name: Hero of Environ
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Hero difficulty.

achievement.name: Hero of Heroes
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Master Hero difficulty.

achievement.name: This Is Why You Were Chosen
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on The Chosen One difficulty.

achievement.name: One Space at a Time
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Pawn strategic difficulty.

achievement.name: Two Up, One Across
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Knight strategic difficulty.

achievement.name: Not a Rookie
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Rook strategic difficulty.

achievement.name: Queen Takes Overlord
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Queen strategic difficulty.

achievement.name: I Can be Called That Too
achievement.description: Kill the Overlord on Overlord strategic difficulty.

achievement.name: Innocence Lost!
achievement.description: Be present at the death of a monster.

achievement.name: Cutting Your Teeth
achievement.description: Be present at the death of 100 monsters.

achievement.name: Monster Control Specialist
achievement.description: Be present at the death of 1000 monsters.

achievement.name: Exterminator Extraordinare
achievement.description: Be present at the death of 10000 monsters.

achievement.name: Welcome to Environ!
achievement.description: Die.

achievement.name: Happens All The Time. Don't Worry About It.
achievement.description: Die 5 times.

achievement.name: Learning The Ropes
achievement.description: Die 25 times.

achievement.name: Losing Is Fun!
achievement.description: Die 50 times.

achievement.name: Congratulations, You Have Died!
achievement.description: Die 100 times.

achievement.name: No, It Doesn't Lead To Extra Lives.
achievement.description: Pick up a Mercenary Coin.

achievement.name: Filty Lucre. But Not Very Much Of It.
achievement.description: Pick up 10 Mercenary Coins.

achievement.name: I Hope You're Using These.
achievement.description: Pick up 50 Mercenary Coins.

achievement.name: You Can Only Hold 99, You Know.
achievement.description: Pick up 100 Mercenary Coins.

achievement.name: Perhaps If Used To Fill A Swimming Pool...
achievement.description: Pick up 500 Mercenary Coins

achievement.name: Capitalism, Ho!
achievement.description: Pick up 1000 Mercenary Coins.

achievement.name: It's Like A Documentary
achievement.description: Enter a Wilderness region.

achievement.name: Is There A Light Down Here?
achievement.description: Enter a cave.

achievement.name: Help me Doc!
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a Clinic.

achievement.name: It's Noisy in Here!
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a Factory Building.

achievement.name: I'm Hungry
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a farm.

achievement.name: Nice Place
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a large house.

achievement.name: The Agent Called it Cute
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a small house.

achievement.name: There's a Lot of Junk Here.
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a Salvage Yard.

achievement.name: That Place Looks Mean
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains an Evil Outpost.

achievement.name: It's Nothing But Rubble
achievement.description: Enter region with a house that is completely destroyed.

achievement.name: Is There No Water Anywhere?
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Desert Amplifier Tower.

achievement.name: Did Someone Forget to Pay the Heating Bill?
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a Cold Dispersal Transmission Tower.

achievement.name: It's Getting Hot In Here.
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains a Heat Dispersal Transmission Tower.

achievement.name: Let There Be Light!
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains an Ivory Tower.

achievement.name: Watch Your Step!
achievement.description: Enter a region that is full of rubble.

achievement.name: Knowledge Raid!
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Skelebot Research Facility.

achievement.name: Does Lando Live There?
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Stratospheric Citadel.

achievement.name: That's Where The Big Guy Lives
achievement.description: Enter region containing the Overlord's Keep.

achievement.name: Getting Stronger Every Day
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Level-Up Tower.

achievement.name: There's More Work To Be Done
achievement.description: Enter a region that has a building that can be converted.

achievement.name: NONE SHALL PASS!
achievement.description: Enter a region with an impasse.

achievement.name: That's a lot of guns.
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Military Complex.

achievement.name: There's Magic In The Air
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Desert Pyramid or Magic Focal Tower (both have special strategic powers).

achievement.name: Is it Chicken?
achievement.description: Enter a region that contains an alternate food producer.

achievement.name: Cozy
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Chateau.

achievement.name: Justice Served!
achievement.description: Enter a region with a City Hall

achievement.name: Dilapidated
achievement.description: Enter a region with Junkyard shacks.

achievement.name: There's a lot of Empty Space...
achievement.description: Enter a region with an abandoned warehouse

achievement.name: Is This Where the Round Table Is?
achievement.description: Enter a region with a Swamp Castle.

achievement.name: Decidophobia
achievement.description: Put at least one point in every skill in the manor.

achievement.name: Plutophobia
achievement.description: Reach level 50 or higher.

achievement.name: Aurophilia
achievement.description: Open your very first gold chest.

achievement.name: Gymnophobia
achievement.description: Have one piece of equipment in every item slot.

achievement.name: Disposophobia
achievement.description: Find all blueprints (purchase not necessary).

achievement.name: Cainotophilia
achievement.description: Have one rune equipped in every item slot.

achievement.name: Ommetaphobia
achievement.description: Defeat the boss in Castle Hamson.

achievement.name: Phasmophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the boss in the Forest Abkhazia.

achievement.name: Pyrophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the boss in the Maya.

achievement.name: Blennophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the boss in the Land of Darkness.

achievement.name: Paterphobia
achievement.description: Defeat the last boss.

achievement.name: Zoophobia
achievement.description: Defeat all the minibosses.

achievement.name: Geminiphobia
achievement.description: Beat the game... twice.

achievement.name: Bibliophilia
achievement.description: Read the last journal entry.

achievement.name: Barophobia
achievement.description: Use the special class at least once.

achievement.name: Somniphobia
achievement.description: Play the game for at least 20 hours.

achievement.name: Coulrophilia
achievement.description: Beat one of the clown's games at least once.

achievement.name: Gnosiophilia
achievement.description: Find all the runes (purchase not necessary).

achievement.name: Syngenesophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the brothers.

achievement.name: Chemophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the trademarked chemical.

achievement.name: Ostiophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the son.

achievement.name: Scotomaphobia
achievement.description: Defeat the doppleganger.

achievement.name: Astrophobia
achievement.description: Defeat the asteroids.

achievement.name: Katagelasticism
achievement.description: Mock the traitor.

achievement.name: Lab Rat
achievement.description: Acquire the fully powered Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device.

achievement.name: Fratricide
achievement.description: Do whatever it takes to survive.

achievement.name: Partygoer
achievement.description: Make the correct party escort submission position decision.

achievement.name: Heartbreaker
achievement.description: Complete Portal.

achievement.name: Terminal Velocity
achievement.description: Fall 30,000 feet.

achievement.name: Long Jump
achievement.description: Jump 300 feet.

achievement.name: Cupcake
achievement.description: Beat two Portal advanced maps.

achievement.name: Fruitcake
achievement.description: Beat four Portal advanced maps.

achievement.name: Vanilla Crazy Cake
achievement.description: Beat all six Portal advanced maps.

achievement.name: Basic Science
achievement.description: Earn bronze medals on all Portal challenges.

achievement.name: Rocket Science
achievement.description: Earn silver medals on all Portal challenges.

achievement.name: Aperture Science
achievement.description: Earn gold medals on all Portal challenges.

achievement.name: Camera Shy
achievement.description: Detach security cameras from the walls.

achievement.name: Friendly Fire
achievement.description: Knock down a turret with another turret.

achievement.name: First Blood
achievement.description: Destroy 10 towers

achievement.name: Repairman
achievement.description: Repair 5 units

achievement.name: This Stuff Is Good
achievement.description: Collect 14 Carusaurum caches

achievement.name: Little Collector
achievement.description: Collect 20 abilities

achievement.name: Eureka
achievement.description: Protect deployed Decoy with Smoke Screen

achievement.name: The Suit Works Fine
achievement.description: Use every ability 10 times each

achievement.name: Towerbane
achievement.description: Destroy every tower type 10 times each

achievement.name: Pimp Your Squad
achievement.description: Fully upgrade a unit

achievement.name: Master Technician
achievement.description: Fully upgrade every unit type 2 times each

achievement.name: Army Nurse
achievement.description: Use one Repair ability to fix 400 damage

achievement.name: Death From Above
achievement.description: Use one Airstrike ability to kill 4 towers

achievement.name: Baghdad Saviour
achievement.description: Complete Baghdad chapter of Story Mode

achievement.name: Tokyo Saviour
achievement.description: Complete Tokyo chapter of Story Mode

achievement.name: Earth Saviour
achievement.description: Complete Story Mode

achievement.name: Mayhem Unleashed
achievement.description: Complete Baghdad Mayhem

achievement.name: A Bridge Too Far
achievement.description: Complete Tokyo Raid

achievement.name: Blinded Enemy
achievement.description: Use one Smoke Screen ability to protect 6 units

achievement.name: Gold Standard
achievement.description: Earn a gold medal

achievement.name: Lightning Strike
achievement.description: Earn 10 gold Directness medals

achievement.name: Fists of Stone
achievement.description: Earn 5 gold Ruthlessness medals

achievement.name: Provident
achievement.description: Earn 10 gold Efficiency medals

achievement.name: War Hero
achievement.description: Earn every gold medal during Story Mode

achievement.name: Neverending Legend
achievement.description: Earn every Squad Assault Mode gold medal

achievement.name: Avenger
achievement.description: Destroy 5000 towers

achievement.name: Diversity Is Fun
achievement.description: Complete a mission with squad composed of 6 different units

achievement.name: Survivalist
achievement.description: Complete a mission without using Repair ability

achievement.name: Multitasker
achievement.description: Use 4 different abilities simultaneously

achievement.name: Charge Champ
achievement.description: Complete mission 1 having 7 Repair ability charges in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Tower Buster
achievement.description: Complete mission 2 with every tower killed in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: On Fire
achievement.description: Complete mission 3 while moving your squad in front each Scorcher in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: What You See
achievement.description: Complete mission 4 without using Decoy ability in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Charge Master
achievement.description: Complete mission 5 having 20 ability charges in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Blink Of An Eye
achievement.description: Complete mission 6 while beating timed part in less than 190 seconds in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: As it Comes
achievement.description: Complete mission 7 without a single unit upgrade in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Unscathed
achievement.description: Complete mission 8 with transporter not being hit in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Standing Tall
achievement.description: Complete mission 9 without Hero getting knocked down in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Foot Soldier
achievement.description: Complete mission 10 without using Air Strike ability in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: And Stay Down!
achievement.description: Complete mission 11 without letting Energizer towers respawn other towers in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Master Strategist
achievement.description: Complete mission 12 while killing at most 44 towers in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Down But Not Out
achievement.description: Complete mission 13 while letting at least 7 artillery strikes hit your squad in Advanced difficulty mode

achievement.name: Glutton For Punnishment
achievement.description: Complete the last Boss stage while allowing at most 6 respawn waves in Advanced difficulty mode
